alert.note: Alert for Claiborne; Copiah; Jefferson; Lincoln (Mississippi) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 15 at 10:27AM CDT until June 15 at 11:30AM CDT by NWS Jackson
info.description: The National Weather Service in Jackson has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southern Claiborne County in southwestern Mississippi... Northwestern Lincoln County in south central Mississippi... Northeastern Jefferson County in southwestern Mississippi... Southwestern Copiah County in central Mississippi... * Until 1130 AM CDT. * At 1027 AM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Port Gibson, moving southeast at 40 mph. THIS IS A DESTRUCTIVE STORM FOR CLAIBORNE AND JEFFERSON COUNTIES. HAZARD...Baseball size hail and 60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...People and animals outdoors will be severely injured. Expect shattered windows, extensive damage to roofs, siding, and vehicles. * This severe thunderstorm will be near... Port Gibson around 1030 AM CDT. Lorman around 1035 AM CDT. Red Lick around 1040 AM CDT. Pattison around 1045 AM CDT. Blue Hill around 1050 AM CDT. Peyton around 1055 AM CDT. Mcbride around 1100 AM CDT. Pleasant Hill and Barlow around 1105 AM CDT. THUNDERSTORM DAMAGE THREAT...DESTRUCTIVE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...2.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
